flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
用角一击连大树都能折断。
在阿罗拉，锹农炮虫是它最大的竞争者。

角の　一撃は　大木　さえ
へし折るほど。　アローラでは
クワガノンが　最大の　ライバル。

One solid blow from its horns is enough to split
apart a large tree. Its greatest rival in Alola
is Vikavolt.

Con le sue corna può abbattere un grande
albero in un colpo solo. Nella regione di Alola,
Vikavolt è il suo più acerrimo nemico.

Es capaz de derribar un árbol de una sola
arremetida. En Alola, su mayor rival es Vikavolt.

Ein Stoß mit seinen Hörnern reicht, um große
Bäume zu zersplittern. In Alola ist Donarion
sein größter Rivale.

Il peut abattre un grand arbre d’un coup de
corne. À Alola, son plus grand rival est Lucanon.

角的一擊連大樹都能折斷。
在阿羅拉，鍬農炮蟲是牠最大的競爭者。

뿔의 일격은 큰 나무조차도
부러뜨릴 정도다. 알로라에서는
투구뿌논이 최대의 라이벌이다.

ツノの　いちげきは　たいぼく　さえ
へしおるほど。　アローラでは
クワガノンが　さいだいの　ライバル。

たくましい　２本の　ツノの　表面に　ある
トゲが　相手の　体に　深く　食い込むので
挟まれると　簡単に　外せないのだ。

Pinsir has a pair of massive horns. Protruding from the surface
of these horns are thorns. These thorns are driven deeply into
the foe’s body when the pincer closes, making it tough for the
foe to escape.

Pinsir è dotato di due chele enormi sul capo, dalla cui
superficie sporgono aculei. Questi vengono conficcati
nel corpo del nemico quando le chele si chiudono,
per impedirne la fuga.

Pinsir tiene un par de cuernos imponentes recubiertos de
pinchos, que se clavan en el cuerpo del rival. Una vez que
los ha clavado, no hay quien escape de su abrazo.

Pinsir hat ein Paar massive Hörner. Aus diesen ragen Dornen
hervor, die sich in den Körper seines Gegners hineinbohren,
wenn sich die Zange schließt, und ihm das Entkommen
schwer machen.

Scarabrute est doté de cornes imposantes. Des pointes
jaillissent de la surface de ses cornes. Ces pointes s’enfoncent
profondément dans le corps de l’ennemi, l’empêchant ainsi
de s’échapper.

늠름한 2개의 뿔 표면에 있는
가시가 상대의 몸에 깊숙이 파고들어서
집히면 쉽게 벗어날 수 없다.

たくましい　２ほんの　ツノの　ひょうめんに　ある
トゲが　あいての　からだに　ふかく　くいこむので
はさまれると　かんたんに　はずせないのだ。

自分の　体重の　２倍も　ある　相手を
ツノで　挟 　軽々　持ち上げる　怪力。
寒い　場所では　体の　動きが　鈍る。

Pinsir is astoundingly strong. It can grip a foe weighing twice
its weight in its horns and easily lift it. This Pokémon’s
movements turn sluggish in cold places.

Pinsir è incredibilmente forte. Può afferrare e sollevare tra
le chele sul capo un nemico dal peso doppio rispetto al suo.
I suoi movimenti sono impacciati in luoghi freddi.

Pinsir es sorprendentemente fuerte. Puede agarrar con los
cuernos a un rival que pese el doble que él y levantarlo por
los aires. En zonas frías, los movimientos de este Pokémon
se vuelven lentos.

Pinsir ist erstaunlich stark. Es kann einen Feind, der
doppelt so viel wiegt wie es selbst, mit seinen Hörnern
packen und hochheben. Bei niedrigen Temperaturen
werden die Bewegungen dieses Pokémon schwerfällig.

Scarabrute est incroyablement fort. Il peut attraper un ennemi
qui pèse deux fois son poids dans ses mandibules et le
soulever sans le moindre problème. Lorsqu’il fait froid,
les mouvements de ce Pokémon sont un peu ralentis.

자신의 몸무게 두 배나 되는 상대를 뿔로
집어 가볍게 들어 올리는 괴력을 지녔다.
추운 곳에서는 몸의 움직임이 둔해진다.

じぶんの　たいじゅうの　２ばいも　ある　あいてを
ツノで　はさ 　かるがる　もちあげる　かいりき。
さむい　ばしょでは　からだの　うごきが　にぶる。

長い　ツノを　振り回して
攻撃してくる。寒いときは
森の　奥に　姿を　隠す。

It swings its long pincer horns wildly to attack.
During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.

Quando attacca agita le lunghe corna. Nei periodi
freddi sta nascosto nelle foreste.

Arremete violentamente con su cornamenta. Cuando
llega el frío, se adentra en los bosques.

Beim Angriff verdreht es sein Geweih.
In Kälteperioden versteckt es sich tief im Wald.

Il attaque sauvagement avec ses cornes. En hiver,
il se cache au plus profond des forêts.

긴 뿔을 휘둘러서
공격을 해온다. 추울 때는
숲 깊은 곳에 몸을 숨긴다.

ながい　ツノを　ふりまわして
こうげきしてくる。さむいときは
もりの　おくに　すがたを　かくす。

２本の　ツノで　獲物を　挟んで
ちぎれるまで　放さない。ちぎれない
ときは　かなたまで　投げ飛ばすのだ。

It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn
in half. What it can’t tear, it tosses far.

Afferra la preda con le pinze e non la molla finché
non l’ha tranciata. Se non ci riesce, la scaglia via.

Atrapa presas con sus pinzas hasta que las parte en
dos. Lanza lejos lo que no puede quebrar.

Es hält seine Beute mit seiner Zange fest und
teilt sie dann. Was es nicht teilen kann, wirft es fort.

Il serre les proies dans ses pinces pour les trancher
en deux. S’il n’y arrive pas, il les jette au loin.

2개의 뿔 사이에 먹이를 끼우고
조각날 때까지 놓지 않는다. 조각나지
않으면 저편으로 세게 내던진다.

２ほんの　ツノで　えものを　はさんで
ちぎれるまで　はなさない。ちぎれない
ときは　かなたまで　なげとばすのだ。

It grips prey with its powerful
pincers and will not let go
until the prey is torn in half.

It grips prey with its powerful
pincers and will not let go
until the prey is torn in half.

It grips prey with its pincers
until the prey is torn in half.
What it can’t tear, it tosses far.

Il serre les proies dans ses pinces
pour les trancher en deux. S’il n’y
arrive pas, il les jette au loin.

It grips prey with its pincers
until the prey is torn in half.
What it can’t tear, it tosses far.

Il serre les proies dans ses pinces
pour les trancher en deux. S’il n’y
arrive pas, il les jette au loin.

It swings its long pincer horns wildly
to attack. During cold periods, it
hides deep in forests.

With its pincer horns, it digs burrows
to sleep in at night. In the morning,
damp soil clings to its body.

It grips prey with its pincers
until the prey is torn in half.
What it can’t tear, it tosses far.

It grips prey with its pincers
until the prey is torn in half.
What it can’t tear, it tosses far.

It grips prey with its pincers
until the prey is torn in half.
What it can’t tear, it tosses far.

If it fails to crush the foe in its
pincers, it will swing around and toss
the opponent.

Its two long pincer horns are powerful.
Once they grip an enemy, they won’t
release until the foe is torn.

Their pincers are strong enough to
shatter thick logs. Because they dislike
cold, PINSIR burrow and sleep under
the ground on chilly nights.

PINSIR has a pair of massive horns 
Protruding from the surface of these
horns are thorns. These thorns are driven deeply into the
foe’s body when the pincer closes,
making it tough for the foe to escape.

PINSIR is astoundingly strong. It can
grip a foe weighing twice its weight
in its horns and easily lift it. This POKéMON’s movements turn sluggish
in cold places.

When the tempera­
ture drops at
night, it sleeps on treetops or
among roots where
it is well hidden.

Swings its long
antlers wildly to
attack. During cold periods, it
hides deep in
forests.

With its horns, it
digs burrows to
sleep in at night. In the morning,
damp soil clings
to its body.

Grips its prey in
its pincers and
squeezes hard! It can't move if it's
cold, so it lives
in warm places.

If it fails to
crush the victim
in its pincers, it will swing it
around and toss
it hard.

If it fails to
crush the victim
in its pincers, it will swing it
around and toss
it hard.
